item.title: Some Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

1- How i can make my quest tap refresh automatically, My quest tap located in PlayerAssistant.java,

public void writeQuestTab() {
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("Players Online: "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " ", 39155); //quest journal title
				//c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 39162); //quest title
				//c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 39163); //quest title
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("Dark-Spirits", 39164); //quest title
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Refresh[Click Here]", 39165); //quest title
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Agility Points: @red@"+c.SPoints+" ", 39166);
				//c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Assault Points: @yel@"+c.barbPoints+" ", 39167); 
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Pk Points: @red@"+c.pcPoints+" ", 39168); //quest title
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Slayer Task: @red@" + c.taskAmount + " " + Server.npcHandler.getNpcListName(c.slayerTask) + "", 39169);
                c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@SAVE ACCOUNT", 39170);
                //c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@ITEMS KEPT ON DEATH", 39170);
				c.getPA().sendFrame126("- - - - - - - -", 39171);
}

2- When an player spam clicking on any tree, he will get full bag of logs in few sec’s, How i can fix this?

Thanks, Naseem.

Read full topic
